item.description: personal projects command-line tools DeDuplicatus - A Deduplication-Enabled Multi-Cloud App web-instagram - Assignment 1 - Web Instagram youtube-remote - Assignment 2 - YouTube Remote shopping-website - a fast, secure, and user-friendly shopping website opengl-playground - CSCI3260 Assignment 2 non-photorealistic-rendering - CSCI 3290 Computational Photography Project neural-network-project - CSCI3230 Project linux-shell - CENG3150 Programming Assignment 1 java-database-project - CSCI3170 GROUP PROJECT hadoop-wordcount - CSCI4180 Assignment 1 fake-ireserve-bot - Fake iReserve Bot (Chrome Extension) csci3290 - CSCI3290 Assignment Collection csci3180 - CSCI3180 Assignment Collection chatroom - CENG3150 Programming Assignment 2 Othello - A command line Othello game written in C++ drift-runners - A real time multiplayer top-down car game vim plugins Code blocks use the solarized theme.

item.title: About Pixyll
item.description: This Jekyll theme was crafted with <3 by John Otander (@4lpine). Checkout the Github repository to download it, request a feature, report a bug, or contribute. It’s free, and open source (MIT). Thanks to the following: BASSCSS Jekyll Refills Solarized
